name: Craftwork
headline: Digital-native home painting franchise
description: Craftwork is a full-service home painting company that uses software to dramatically improve the homeowner and operator experience.

founders.name: Tim Griffin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Tim is an active angel investor and two-time YC founder. He's currently the co-founder and CEO of Craftwork (YC S23) and previously founded Cloosiv (YC S19), a company that he successfully completed a merger of equals with Odeko and grew annual revenue from $0 to $150M+ in just 18 months. Odeko is currently #115 on Y Combinator’s top companies list.

founders.name: Mike Bifulco, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO of Craftwork, co-founder of APIs You Won't Hate, author at mikebifulco.com. Co-founder of smpl (acquired 2020). 

Past work includes DevRel at Stripe, DevRel manager and TL for Google Assistant, UX at Microsoft, and Technical Director at Gymnasium 

💌 Tiny Improvements: https://mikebifulco.com/newsletter

founders.name: Suzanne Griffin, Founder
founders.description: I've been an early stage employee at two YC startups (CareRev S16, and Plato W16) and I'm the Co-founder of Craftwork (YC S23).

founders.name: Joey Skavroneck, Founder
founders.description: Joey scaled Zoomo from a seed stage company to the global leader in their category, leading their North American business and largest global partnerships. Previously, he was a management consultant, sold his OOH advertising company, and earned his MBA from Stanford GSB.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Craftwork**

Founded in 2023, Craftwork is a digital-native home painting franchise based in Charlotte, North Carolina. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, this fast-growing company focuses on transforming the home painting experience using innovative software solutions. With a dedicated team of 50 employees, Craftwork aims to simplify and enhance how homeowners approach painting projects.

**Mission and Services:**
Craftwork's mission is clear: to create a seamless, transparent experience for homeowners looking to beautify their spaces. They offer a variety of services, including:

- **Interior Painting:** Revitalize the inside of your home with expert craftsmanship.
- **Exterior Painting:** Breathe new life into your home's curb appeal.
- **Cabinet Finishing:** Transform kitchens with stylish cabinet upgrades.
- **Commercial Services:** Catering to business environments needing a fresh coat.

Their ethos revolves around simplicity, providing quick estimates, clear pricing, and a streamlined process from project conception to execution. Homeowners just answer a few questions to receive a cost estimate, upload details for planning, and then relax as Craftwork's professional team takes over.

**Core Values:**
Craftwork emphasizes transparency, with no hidden fees or unexpected costs—just quality craftsmanship accessible to everyone.

**Community and Team:**
The company is proud to serve the Charlotte area, with a strong commitment to customer satisfaction reflected in glowing testimonials from pleased clients. The team's expertise ranges from fresh apprentices to seasoned painting veterans, ensuring top-notch results.

**Contact and Learn More:**
If you're located in or around Charlotte, and are considering a painting project, Craftwork is worth a look. You can reach them at (704) 380-9035 or explore their services through their website: [Craftwork](https://craftwork.com/).

In a nutshell, Craftwork stands out not just for its painting prowess, but for leveraging technology to improve the customer experience—making it easier than ever to add a splash of color to your home.
